title: Huge TV deal: this stunning Sony 65-inch 4K TV gets a $500 price cut at Best Buy
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Sony's X85J Series TV drops to a record-low price of $1,099.99
article: If you're looking to score a price cut on a premium big-screen 4K TV, then you've come to the right place. We've just spotted this Sony 65-inch 4K TV on sale for $1,099.99 (was $1,599.99) at Best Buy. That's a massive $500 discount and the lowest price we've found for Sony's X85J series set.

Sony's X85J Series has everything and more that you’d want in your dream big-screen TV. The 65-inch 4K TV delivers a stunning picture with life-like images thanks to Sony's powerful X1 4K HDR processor, which results in a super-smooth experience with brilliant colors and sharp contrasts. The Google TV also features smart capabilities for seamless streaming and works with Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant for hands-free control. As we've mentioned above, this is the lowest price we've found for the 65-inch 4K TV and $38 less than Amazon's current deal. We don't know how long Best Buy will have the Sony set at this price, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.

You can also see the best cheap TV deals and sales that are happening right now. If you're looking for a premium panel you can also see the best OLED TV deals and sales. You can also look forward to upcoming Labor Day sales from retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Home Depot.
